posts.post_content:
I've lowered prices on many of the cards in my [URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/mwieder/ForTradeSale#"]sale album[/URL] (including a T206 Young portrait).

I've also added a few cards, like this one:
[IMG]http://lh4.ggpht.com/_pAhpQ3jIX9M/Si8TQCAoerI/AAAAAAAAECY/_g_Vk4ZfhhE/s800/scan0019.jpg[/IMG]

I'm interested in the Steinfeldt.  Shipping? Paypal?  Email me at [url]rreisshead@aol.com[/url].
Thanks,  Bob

HI, I'll take the Young Portrait if it is still available.

Andy

e-mail me at [url]andysargent@live.ca[/url]

[quote name="reisshead" post=729141]I'm interested in the Steinfeldt.  Shipping? Paypal?  Email me at [url]rreisshead@aol.com[/url].

Bob - email sent.  Steiny is yours.

Andy - I was contactyed earlier by someone else and we're trying to come to terms on a cards + cash deal; if it is available I will be in touch.
